nodes.title: Happy Friday!!!
nodes.description: We need your help to reach our next goal of 75,000 signatures! Please sign and share our petition to keep it going!

nodes.title: Keep it up! We are doing great!
nodes.description: We’re so close to reaching 64,000 signatures! Thank you all for your support! Let’s keep going!

nodes.title: Extraordinary!!!
nodes.description: I started this petition unsure if it would take off. Look at where we are now with over 55,000 signatures! I am so grateful to have found people who will stand with me to make a difference! Thank you all! Now we need to spread the word to make this petition HUGE. Will you please share on social media, text & email? If enough of us sign, we can build an unstoppable call for change!

nodes.title: We have over 52,000 signatures and counting!
nodes.description: Wow! Keep up the amazing work! Let’s try to reach our next goal of 75,000! Thank you all for your help!

nodes.title: How exciting! We’re inching close to 50,000 signatures!
nodes.description: I hope you’re all having a wonderful weekend. Let’s keep sharing the petition and growing our numbers!

nodes.title: Way to go! We are on fire!!
nodes.description: We’ve now surpassed 46,000 signatures! Let’s keep sharing this petition to let our voice be heard! Thank you all for your wonderful support!

nodes.title: Join us on Facebook - Texas Coronavirus

embeddedMedia.description: Texas Coronavirus has 14,276 members. This group has been created for Texans and members with family/friends residing here. Our members can share and gain information and discuss concerns...

nodes.title: Outstanding!!!!
nodes.description: We have over 44,000 signatures! You are all doing an amazing job and I am so very grateful for your support! Let's keep going to reach our next goal of 50,000. We've got this!

nodes.title: Happy Friday!!!
nodes.description: Thank you all so much for helping me with this petition! We’re up to more than 22,000 signatures, but I really want us to get to 25,000 to make some noise! Will you please help us by posting on social media today to ask people to sign and share?

nodes.title: Come join us on Facebook!
nodes.description:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/686948408509375
Don’t forget to join our Texas Coronavirus group! Thank you all for coming together!

embeddedMedia.description: Texas Coronavirus has 14,238 members. This group has been created for Texans and members with family/friends residing here. Our members can share and gain information and discuss concerns...

nodes.title: Reinstate the Texas COVID-19 Mask Mandate - Update 3
nodes.description: Way to go! We’ve reached over 20,000 signatures! Let’s keep going to reach our second goal of 25,000! Thank you all for your support!

nodes.title: Reinstate the Texas COVID-19 Mask Mandate - Update 2
nodes.description:
We have surpassed the first goal of 15,000 signatures! Keep up the great work and thank you all for joining and supporting our cause!   

https://www.facebook.com/groups/686948408509375/

embeddedMedia.description: Texas Coronavirus has 14,177 members. This group has been created for Texans and members with family/friends residing here. Our members can share and gain information and discuss concerns...

nodes.title: Reinstate the Texas COVID-19 Mask Mandate - Update
nodes.description:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/686948408509375/

We have 13,586 signatures so far! Let's keep it going by sharing the petition to family, friends and social media platforms! Thank you all so much for your support and efforts! Feel free to join our Facebook group "Texas Coronavirus". We've got this! ❤
